EmailTemplate.name: 202002_Global_HAT_B737-700-Teardown_Email.202002 HAT B737-700 teardown
EmailTemplate.subject: B737-700 Parts for Sale from Honeywell Aerospace Trading's Latest Acquired Aircraft
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Honeywell Aerospace Trading (HAT) has acquired a Boeing 737-700 aircraft for teardown. A major U.S. carrier operated the aircraft for the entirety of its serviceable life. The disassembly of this aircraft, MSN 27842, with a 1998 date of manufacture, has commenced in Goodyear, Arizona, USA.
HAT continues to expand our support of the 737NG product line with this strategic acquisition, enabling us to provide complete inventory support for 737NG customers.
Removed components will be fully re-certified and available for sale or exchange from the Honeywell Distribution Center in Phoenix, Arizona. Components will also be available for immediate purchase from HATâ€™s storefront on GoDirect Trade. A number of items will be available for sale in As-Removed condition.
HAT is a growing provider of used serviceable material to aircraft operators and maintenance, repair and overhaul facilities worldwide via our global sales force and stocking locations in Europe, North America and the Asia-Pacific region. CONTACT US <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/HAT_A320_201904.html?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_hat&utm_content=marketo]]> We appreciate your continued business support!
Your friends at Honeywell Aerospace Trading
